content_descriptors.notes: Main character have no pants and simplified depiction of his private parts is visible.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: i3 Sandy Bridge Dual Core or Equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: i5 Sandy Bridge Quad Core or Equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan support is required for some graphic features
